metadata.title: CVE-2011-2716 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - negligible.
metadata.description: The DHCP client (udhcpc) in BusyBox before 1.20.0 allows remote DHCP servers to execute arbitrary commands via shell metacharacters in the (1) HOST_NAME, (2) DOMAIN_NAME, (3) NIS_DOMAIN, and (4) TFTP_SERVER_NAME host name options.

notes.note: mdeslaur> similar to CVE-2011-0997, but for busybox

criterions.comment: busybox package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:1.22.0-9ubuntu1').
